question: To mark the victory of his conquests Rana Kumbha erected a Victory Tower at which of the following places?
explanation: Rana Kumbha and Sultan Mahmud Khalji of Malwa had a history of a tussle. They fought against each other, and interestingly, both sides claimed victory. To mark the victory of his conquests, Rana Kumbha erected a Victory Tower at Chittor.
